results.name: Square array T(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where T(n,k) is Sum_{i=0..n} (-2)^(n-i)*binomial(n,i)*Sum_{j=0..i} binomial(i,j)^k.
comment: T(n,k) is the constant term in the expansion of (-2 + Product_{j=1..k-1} (1 + x_j) + Product_{j=1..k-1} (1 + 1/x_j))^n for k > 0.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[(-2)^(n-i) * Binomial[n, i] * Sum[Binomial[i, j]^k, {j, 0, i}], {i, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 06 2021 *)
